item.title: TEST
item.description: \[\sqrt(4)\] $z^2$ \[\sum_{x=1}^5 y^z\] \[\int_a^b f(x)\] \( \begin{matrix} {z = re^{i\phi}z^n = (re^{i\phi})^n = \\ =r^ne^{in\phi} =\\ r^n(cosn\phi + i sin n\phi)} \end{matrix} \) \( x = \begin{cases} a &\text{if } b \\ c &\text{if } d \end{cases} \) \[x = \begin{cases} a &\text{if } b \\ c &\text{if } d \end{cases}\] \begin{smallmatrix} a & b c & d \end{smallmatrix} \[\begin{CD} A @a B \\ @VbVV @AAcA \\ C @= D \end{CD}\]
